title: I dont play support but its kinda funny how sona was basically gutted over 2 patches
body:
Like sona actually got destroyed with nerfs in only 2 patches while ezreal got love tapped twice and is still one of the most overpowered champions in the game that is permabanned in ranked.

Never change riot, biased balance team, same shit with buffing tanks for multiple patches and nerfing bruisers over and over, tanks got bad for 1 patch? INTRODUCE BRAMBLE VEST QUICKLY! One of the most op items to ever exist in the game, bruisers have been bad for the last multiple seasons? Too bad LOL go play ornn vs maokai top lane we think that is better for you - riot games
